Summary: photographed sphere in new york city that was not witnessed at time
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around September 6th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn September 6th, 2007, at 7:07pm I took three consecutive images of the sunset with my "blackberry 8300 curve" from my apartment facing the hudson river. One image appears to have an unidentified object which was not witnessed by me at the time. Images attached. they are still saved in my blackberry along with their "properties." sincerely, andre strishak
